select exam_info.exam_name,exam_info.start_exam,exam_info.end_exam,class_room_info.room_number,teacher_info.teacher_name from (exam_info inner join class_room_info on exam_info.room_id = class_room_info.id) inner join teacher_info on exam_info.proctor_id = teacher_info.id
exam_info.exam_name like concat('%',#{examName},'%')

select exam_info.exam_name,exam_info.start_exam,exam_info.end_exam,class_room_info.room_number,teacher_info.teacher_name from (exam_info inner join class_room_info on exam_info.room_id = class_room_info.id) inner join teacher_info on exam_info.proctor_id = teacher_info.id
class_room_info.room_number like concat('%',#{roomNumber},'%')

select exam_info.exam_name, exam_info.start_exam, exam_info.end_exam, class_room_info.room_number, teacher_info.teacher_name, teacher_info.teacher_number from exam_info inner join class_room_info on exam_info.room_id = class_room_info.id inner join teacher_info on exam_info.proctor_id = teacher_info.id inner join course_info on exam_info.course_id = course_info.id inner join course_name on course_info.course_number = course_name.course_number
teacher_info.teacher_number = #{teacherNumber} and teacher_info.teacher_name like concat('%',#{teacherName},'%') and course_name.year = #{year} and course_name.semester = #{semester}

select student_info.student_num, student_info.student_name, exam_info.exam_name, exam_info.start_exam, exam_info.end_exam, class_room_info.room_number from student_exam inner join exam_info on student_exam.course_id = exam_info.course_id inner join student_info on student_exam.student_id = student_info.id inner join class_room_info on exam_info.room_id = class_room_info.id
student_info.student_Num = #{studentNum} and student_info.student_name like concat('%',#{studentName},'%')
